title: Configuring the blog
text: On this post I keep a record of all the steps needed to configure/publish the blog

title: Configuring the blog
text:
Publishing to github-pages
I follow the steps described in the Publish command section of the Github pages part of the quarto documentation.
In order to use quarto publish from the command line I create a Personal Access token using the instructions here

title: Configuring the blog
text:
Adding custom domain
I follow the guide Managing a custom domain for your GitHub Pages site
